package.name: OptiMonkM1
package.summary: This extension allows you to integrate OptiMonk with your Site
package.description:
OptiMonk is the most powerful Onsite Retargeting platform, that helps you increase the conversion rate of your site, and get more leads by recovering lost visitors.
Exit offers provides you a powerful and simple way to convert more visitors to buyers and build your email list. Your messages show up with a special offer at the exact moment a visitor is about to leave your site – down to the millisecond. Basically you get a second chance to convince your visitors.
Why is OptiMonk more advanced than other exit offer tools?
Other exit offer tools will just allow you to show your visitors a coupon code or discount once, and then you can just hope, that the visitors will remember these coupon codes.
OptiMonk allows you to build 2-step campaigns: Exit offer: First you can get the visitor’s attention (and email) with an exit offer Nanobar: Then you can display a nanobar at once, reminding the visitor of the coupon code without distracting her shopping. With this 2-step campaign you can increase the number of purchases by up to 100% compared to simple exit offer tools. Basic features: Create Unlimited Offers Lots of Premium Templates to Choose From Easy Customization with WYSWYG editor Display Offers on Exit-Intent, On Scroll, On Entry or After X Seconds Integration with MailChimp, GetResponse, iContact, AWeber, InfusionSoft, etc. No coding required Advanced features: Multi-Page Popups Mobile-Optimized and Responsives Popups Nanobar Campaign Scheduling Geo-Targeting A/B Testing Here are a few case studies you might be interested in: An ebike store was able to increase their subscription rate by 329% A toy retailer was able to increase its revenue by 26,8% A marketing guru was able to increase its subscription rate by 48% An adult store was able to decrease its cart-abandonment rate by 27.6% A marketing agency was able to increase the number of leads by 45% A B2B Security Startup was able to increase the number of free trials by 65%
